sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Two sermons tending to direction for Christian cariage [sic] both in afflictions incumbent, and in judgements imminent : the former on Psalm 13.1, the latter on Hebr. 11.7 / by Thomas Gataker, B. in D. and pastor of Rotherhith. Gataker, Thomas, 1574-1654.
[8], 77, [11], 81-130 p.
Printed by Iohn Haviland, London : 1623.
Each sermon has special t.p. Signatures: A-L4, m4, M-R4, S1. Identified as STC 11681 on reel 1066. Reproductions of originals in the British Library. David's remembrancer -- Noah his obedience.
=======
Two sermons tending to direction for Christian cariage [sic] both in afflictions incumbent, and in judgements imminent : the former on Psalm 13.1, the latter on Hebr. 11.7 / by Thomas Gataker, B. in D. and pastor of Rotherhith. Gataker, Thomas, 1574-1654.
[8], 77, [11], 81-130 p.
Printed by Iohn Haviland, London : 1623.
Each sermon has special t.p. Signatures: A-L4, m4, M-R4, S1. Identified as STC 11681 on reel 1066. Reproductions of originals in the British Library. David's remembrancer -- Noah his obedience.
Iohn Haviland
